basics.name: Jorge Miranda
basics.label: Front-End Engineer | Sr Software Engineer | TS JS Node ðŸŒŽ
basics.summary: Senior Front-End Engineer with 10+ years of expertise in building scalable, high-performance web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks (Vue.js, React.js, Nuxt.js, Next.js). Proven track record of leading teams and delivering complex e-commerce platforms, SaaS solutions, and enterprise applications. Expert in TypeScript, Node.js, and comprehensive testing strategies including Playwright, Jest, and Cypress. Strong foundation in UX/UI design with experience in design systems, accessibility, and performance optimization. Adept at mentoring developers and establishing technical standards in agile environments.

work.summary: Developed innovative audio software solutions using cutting-edge React and TypeScript technologies
highlights: Architected and developed a modern DAW (Digital Audio Workstation) application from scratch using React and TypeScript
Implemented real-time audio processing interfaces with complex state management and performance optimization
Collaborated closely with UX/UI designers to deliver pixel-perfect, user-centric audio editing interfaces
Built reusable React component library with comprehensive TypeScript interfaces for audio controls
Established scalable front-end architecture patterns and coding standards for the development team
Delivered high-quality features in fast-paced agile environment with continuous integration practices

work.summary: Led front-end development initiatives and architected enterprise-scale e-commerce solutions with focus on performance and scalability
highlights: Led cross-functional team of 4+ developers in delivering high-traffic e-commerce platform serving 100K+ monthly users
Architected and implemented scalable React.js component system with Next.js, improving development velocity by 40%
Mentored junior developers and established comprehensive coding standards, reducing code review time by 50%
Successfully migrated complex Next.js application to proprietary framework while maintaining 99.9% uptime
Implemented advanced analytics tracking with Google Tag Manager and GA4, providing actionable insights for business decisions
Optimized application performance achieving 95+ Lighthouse scores across all metrics

work.summary: Developed enterprise e-commerce platform from ground up using modern React ecosystem and advanced design system implementation
highlights: Built greenfield e-commerce platform from scratch using Next.js and React.js, handling 50K+ daily transactions
Implemented Amazon Style Dictionary for comprehensive design token management, ensuring 100% design consistency
Developed responsive and WCAG 2.1 AA compliant user interfaces, improving accessibility score by 85%
Collaborated with UX/UI design team to deliver pixel-perfect implementations using Figma-to-code workflows
Established modular component architecture reducing development time for new features by 60%

work.summary: Enhanced HR SaaS platform functionality through strategic refactoring and modern Vue.js implementation
highlights: Successfully refactored legacy codebase improving application performance by 45% and reducing technical debt
Implemented new features using Vue.js 3 Composition API and TypeScript, enhancing type safety and maintainability
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance user experience, resulting in 30% improvement in user satisfaction metrics
Established comprehensive code review processes and quality standards, reducing production bugs by 60%
Led Vue 2 to Vue 3 migration strategy, modernizing the application architecture and improving development experience

work.summary: Delivered front-end solutions for Technology-as-a-Service platform with focus on scalability and performance
highlights: Developed responsive web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and best practices
Collaborated with distributed teams to deliver high-quality software solutions on tight deadlines
Implemented efficient front-end architectures optimized for performance and maintainability
Contributed to code reviews and technical documentation to ensure consistent development standards

work.summary: Developed comprehensive e-commerce back-office management systems with focus on operational efficiency
highlights: Built intuitive back-office interfaces for e-commerce platform management and inventory control
Implemented data visualization dashboards providing real-time insights for business operations
Developed responsive admin panels with complex form handling and validation systems
Optimized user workflows reducing administrative task completion time by 35%

work.summary: Full-stack e-commerce development with focus on testing and quality assurance using modern frameworks
highlights: Developed high-performance e-commerce solutions using Vue.js, Nuxt.js, and JavaScript serving 200K+ customers
Implemented comprehensive testing strategies with Playwright and Percy, achieving 95% test coverage and reducing production bugs by 70%
Built seamless PHP/Prestashop integrations with Contentful CMS, enabling dynamic content management for marketing teams
Established automated QA processes and CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Crafted responsive designs using SASS and modern CSS frameworks, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and mobile optimization

work.summary: Delivered enterprise web solutions using Adobe Experience Manager and modern JavaScript frameworks in agile and waterfall environments
highlights: Developed content-rich websites using Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) with Vue.js integration for dynamic user experiences
Built complex front-office applications using ExtJS framework with SQL database integration
Collaborated in both Scrum-Agile and Waterfall methodologies, adapting development approach to project requirements
Implemented responsive designs and modern HTML5/CSS3 standards ensuring cross-platform compatibility

work.summary: Developed enterprise store distribution platform using Vue.js ecosystem with focus on scalability and performance optimization
highlights: Built comprehensive store distribution platform using Vue.js and Webpack, serving 500+ retail locations
Implemented full-stack features with Node.js backend integration and RESTful API consumption
Developed responsive interfaces optimized for both desktop and mobile store management workflows
Collaborated in Scrum-Agile environment using Git, Jira, and GitLab for efficient project delivery
Optimized application bundle size and performance, achieving 40% faster load times across all modules

work.summary: Provided comprehensive graphic design and branding solutions for diverse clientele across multiple industries
highlights: Created visual identity and branding materials for 50+ clients across various industries
Designed marketing collateral including logos, brochures, and digital assets with strong brand consistency
Collaborated with clients to translate business requirements into compelling visual communications
Delivered projects on time and within budget while maintaining high design quality standards

work.summary: Provided full-stack web development and design services combining technical expertise with creative vision
highlights: Developed custom websites and web applications for 100+ clients using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and modern frameworks
Created comprehensive design systems and user interfaces optimized for conversion and user experience
Implemented responsive designs ensuring cross-device compatibility and accessibility standards
Managed complete project lifecycle from initial concept to deployment and maintenance
Built long-term client relationships through consistent delivery of high-quality solutions
